title: *NO FEE* Fully renovated basement 2 bedroom in great location *OCT 1*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302367756', 'Rent: $2,295 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Garbage, Gas, Heat, Hot Water, Water', c-tops.', 'New bathroom with modern finishes.', 'Refinished hardwood floors.', 'Updated electrical and fresh paint.*', 'Rent includes heat, hot water and cooking gas', 'Rent directly through law.', '3,7,11 and 15 Carol Ave are professionally owned and managed buildings.', 'Tenants here enjoy free heat, hot water and cooking gas.', 'All units feature hardwood floors and equal size
